FuncDef: This command overrides the system default time between scheduling the hierarchical virtual scheduling task. By default, the system "wakes" the virtual scheduler task every 50ms; this is equivalent to five 10ms timer ticks. The task-scheduling-int command uses a percent value parameter to modify the number of timer ticks.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the percent-of-default parameter is required and is used to modify the default task scheduling interval for the hierarchical virtual scheduling task on the card. Defining 100.00 percent is equivalent to removing the override. Values-0.01% to 1000.00%. ParamDefault: Default- 100.00%
